How long will you be here?
Hurry and connect before time runs\nout!

Other !ntro users may have
 visited this area before.
 Check out all the previous visitors
 by clicking below!

"Just remember, there's always
 new people showing up,
 and ton of new places to go.
 So, next time you start
 an event there's sure to be a lot
 more !ntro action."
"Whenever one of your\n "breadcrumb" matches is near\n you, we'll let you know!"
More people are always\n showing up so keep checking back...
"Looks like you're the first one here...\n Keep checking back\n to see who else shows up!"
"Next time you both start a Go Intro event near each other, we'll let you know!"
There is a new version available. Please download
Make sure to upload your pics so you can get matched!
TO load this page provide permissions for Storage and Location.
Hit ‘Breadcrumb’ to tag your profile to your current location. This will make your profile visible to other Tooplers in this area. *Don’t worry, we never reveal your actual location.
You have new Breadcrumb likes! Click this button to see who liked your profile at a location you visited.
You have 7 days to chat with breadcrumb matches before they go dormant. Once they are dormant, we will auto-match you in a ‘Go Live’ event if they are near!
Live matches expire when your ‘Go Live’ event ends, so hurry and chat them up! Also, if you both you and your match ‘favorite’ each other in the chat screen, you will be able to chat them anytime.
If you favorite your match and they favorite you back, you can chat with them even after your ‘Go Live’ event expires! But remember, the whole point is to meet your match now – so go meet up!
You have new Breadcrumb likes! Click this button to see who like your profile at a location you visited.
Hit \'Go Live\' to activate your profile when you\'re out and ready to see who\'s around!
